data.eml:eml: A new species of Pactola Pascoe, 1876 (Coleoptera: Curculionidae: Eugnomini) from New Caledonia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mazur, Miłosz A., Jezuita, Anna (2015): A new species of Pactola Pascoe, 1876 (Coleoptera: Curculionidae: Eugnomini) from New Caledonia. Zootaxa 3931 (2): 279-285, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3931.2.7
